text: The Inuvik Native Band is a Gwich'in First Nations band government in the Northwest Territories. The band is located in Inuvik, a mixed community where First Nations, Inuit, and non-Indigenous people live in approximately equal numbers. The Inuvik Native Band is a member of the Gwich'in Tribal Council. ==References== Category:First Nations in the Northwest Territories Category:Gwich'in
title: Inuvik Native Band
